response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth every penny of the $15,000 it's worth. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I propose an offer of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
